title: Mentorship
description: I provide personalized guidance to help you navigate your software engineering career, from learning new technologies to career planning and growth.

title: Technical Consultation
description: Get expert advice on designing scalable systems, choosing the right technology stack, and solving complex technical challenges.

title: Interview Preparation
description: Comprehensive preparation for technical interviews including coding problems, system design, and behavioral questions to land your dream job.

title: Code Reviews and Development
description: Professional code review services to improve code quality, security, and maintainability, plus help with development tasks.
